text:
:mega::mega::mega: Figma Design Kit is now in *private beta*! This means that you can now request for access to use this kit through the *<https://app.HubSpot.com/l/product-updates/?update=13932250|product update here>*.

*What is the Figma Design Kit?*
• Its a design file with visual representations of <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/ui-components/overview|UI components> and their variants
• Helps developers and designers plan the designs of their React-based custom cards
• Can be used to create demos and proposals to communicate possibilities of UI Extensibility with stakeholders
• Now, teams can create brainstorm and mock designs with their clients even before development begins.
Sneak peek of what this kit contains below:point_down:We're actively looking for feedback to make sure this solves your needs. Excited to see what you all create:art::tada:

For those who were in the alpha: we've added some updates to the kit. Checkout the *Card Anatomy & Location Wires* section, *Preview Panel* and *Icon component*.
